did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files
1986-2001

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of the Dean of Students Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-18/2/1.001, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 2000 October 17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Topical files of V. Shamim Sisson, Associate Dean of Students; and, F. Aaron Laushway and Michelle A. Samuels, Assistant Deans of Students.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: Associate Dean of Students, Shamin Sisson Boxes 1-7
Series II: Assistant Dean of Students, Aaron Laushway Boxes 8-13
Series III: Assistant Dean of Students, Michelle Samuels Boxes 14-17
Series IV: Restricted Files Box 18

did.unittitle: Series I: Associate Dean of Student, Shamin Sisson
Contact List - Student Government Organizations and Media 1995, 1997, 1998
ODOS Assessment: Questionnaires; Form W-87; SDTLI
Self-Study-Non-traditional Students and Off-grounds Programs Committee 1994-1995

Women's Leadership Development Program Final Dinner 1999
Women's Center Council Program Advisory Committee 1998

Series III: Assistant Dean of Students, Michelle Samuels

Black Women's Groups: "In the Company of My Sisters" 1997
Cultural, Religious Student Organizations and Support Officers 1999
